description:
Doctor Hatena, an underground dweller summoned by Chi-chan`s PriPri Shot, joins the gang, and they finally arrive at the hot spring lodge! They spend the day enjoying the outdoor bath, table tennis, and more at the lodge, but then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chaos! Running Wild at the Hot Spring Lodge?!
Dotabata! Onsen Ryoukan de Oohashagi Dechi!?
ドタバタ! 温泉旅館でおおはしゃぎでち!?
